story.title: Let's go grocery shopping!
text: At the store, Tom buys one red apple.
He also looks for two ripe oranges.
He finally buys three yellow bananas.
storyTranslation: En la tienda, Tom compra una manzana roja.

story.title: Let's decorate a cake!
text: She adds yellow, purple, and blue sprinkles.
She tops the cake with five green candles.
storyTranslation: Emily glasea el pastel de rosa.
Agrega chispas amarillas, moradas y azules.
Ella cubre el pastel con cinco velas verdes.
